mapper.insert: insert into study( year, term, lecture_no, user_id, course_no, question_no, seq_no, answer, system_time, correct_yn ) values( (select year from term_cd where use_yn=1::VARCHAR), (select term from term_cd where use_yn=1::VARCHAR), #{lecture_no}, #{user_id}, #{course_no}, #{question_no}, (select COALESCE(max(seq_no::INTEGER),0)+1 from study ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where lecture_no=#{lecture_no} and user_id=#{user_id} and course_no=#{course_no} and question_no=#{question_no}), #{answer}, now()::TIME WITH TIME ZONE, #{correct_yn} )
mapper.update: update study set year=#{year}, term=#{term}, lecture_no=#{lecture_no}, user_id=#{user_id}, course_no=#{course_no}, question_no=#{question_no}, seq_no=#{seq_no}, answer=#{answer} correct_yn=#{correct_yn}, update_id=#{update_id}, update_date=now()::TIME WITH TIME ZONE where seq_no=#{seq_no}
mapper.select: select year, term, lecture_no, user_id, course_no, question_no, seq_no, answer, system_time, correct_yn, update_id, update_date from study where seq_no=#{seq_no}
select year, term, lecture_no, user_id, course_no, question_no, seq_no, answer, system_time, correct_yn, update_id, update_date from study
